product_name: Mammut Alyeska Protection Avalanche Airbag Vest
long_description: Streamlined to carry just the essentials on your short backcountry freeride ski adventures, the Alyeska Protection Airbag Vest uses an airbag system to help prevent burial and trauma in an avalanche.
short_description: Streamlined to carry just the essentials on your short backcountry freeride ski adventures, the Alyeska Protection Airbag Vest uses an airbag system to help prevent burial and trauma in an avalanche.
